title: Research data quality: Read-result, Bash-result, Grep-result
description: Analyze samples of Read-result, Bash-result, Grep-result. For each type: extract samples, score relevance, recommend handling strategy.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Paper 1 (Read-result): Extract 5+ samples of 'Read-result' from ~/.claude/projects/ JSONL files
Paper 1 (Read-result): Analyze each sample - is it useful for search? Score 1-5 relevance
Paper 2 (Bash-result): Extract 5+ samples of 'Bash-result' from ~/.claude/projects/ JSONL files
Paper 2 (Bash-result): Analyze each sample - is it useful for search? Score 1-5 relevance
Paper 3 (Grep-result): Extract 5+ samples of 'Grep-result' from ~/.claude/projects/ JSONL files
Paper 3 (Grep-result): Analyze each sample - is it useful for search? Score 1-5 relevance
